thread.title: Portland police investigate 2 stabbings near Union Station
thread.title_full: Portland police investigate 2 stabbings near Union Station | OregonLive.com

author: Steve Mayes | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Portland police investigate 2 stabbings near Union Station
text:
Updated at 9:45 a.m.: Two people were stabbed, a man and a woman. Both are expected to survive. The suspected assailant, a "shorter" man wearing blue jeans, fled, police said.
Portland police responded just after 8 a.m. Sunday to reports of a stabbing near the 800 block of Northwest 6th Avenue.
Officers found at least two victims, and a third person has injuries that may be related to the incident.
The medical condition of the victims was immediately unavailable.
This story will be updated.
-- Steve Mayes
smayes@oregonian.com
503-294-5916; @ocmayes
